name: Packet Switching
description: Sub-sector template for packet switching patents (CPC H04L49*) including switch fabrics, buffers, and forwarding engines.
contextDescription: Packet switching patents cover the data plane of network devices. Key areas include switch fabrics (crossbar, Clos), buffer management, packet scheduling, and forwarding ASICs. High-value targets include Memory bandwidth and latency are key differentiators. Broadcom (merchant silicon), Cisco, Arista, and hyperscalers building custom ASICs.
scoringGuidance: Switch fabric patents target high-capacity routers and switches.
Buffer management patents improve QoS and reduce latency.
Forwarding engine patents are in every network ASIC.
Cut-through switching patents target low-latency applications.
Merchant silicon patents target Memory, Memory, Marvell ecosystems.
